mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, token as token, session_key as session_key, scope as scope, refresh_token as refresh_token, session_secret as session_secret, expires_in as expires_in, date as date FROM baiduToken WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO baiduToken(id, token, session_key, expires_in ,date) VALUES ( #{baiduToken.id}, #{baiduToken.token}, #{baiduToken.session_key}, #{baiduToken.expires_in}, #{baiduToken.date} )
